title: How to Get a Plane in Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas

steps.title: If you have a car in your garage already, get in it or find a person driving a car on the road and hijack it, then go down to the Los Santos Airport.
steps.content: If you have a car in your garage already, get in it or find a person driving a car on the road and hijack it, then go down to the Los Santos Airport.

steps.title: Then once you're at the airport, parallel park your car next to the fence.
steps.content: Then once you're at the airport, parallel park your car next to the fence.

steps.title: Get out of your car then get on top of the car and climb the fence.
steps.content: Get out of your car then get on top of the car and climb the fence. You can pick 2 planes to fly in this airport, the Shamal or the Dodo.

steps.title: Again, get a car from your garage or hijack another person's car, then ride to the Los Santos Airport, parallel park it.
steps.content: Again, get a car from your garage or hijack another person's car, then ride to the Los Santos Airport, parallel park it.

steps.title: Then climb the fence again, then get your plane.
steps.content: Then climb the fence again, then get your plane.

steps.title: Then fly to San Fierro.
steps.content: Then fly to San Fierro. You'll get a 6 star wanted level if you haven't unlocked San Fierro yet, so that makes the quest even harder. If you have unlocked all cities, then you're all set.

steps.title: Now, go to the San Fierro Airport.
steps.content: Now, go to the San Fierro Airport. You have at least 3, 4, or 5 helicopters in the airport. The Leviathan, Raindance, Maverick and other helicopters.
